titles.title: Expressing support for designation of May 16, 2024, as the "National Day of Light".
Expressing support for designation of May 16, 2024, as the "National Day of Light".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Science, Space, and Technology.

bill.summary: This resolution supports the designation of a National Day of Light and recognizes the continued importance of the United States as the world leader in light-based science and technology.
